data.title: Beyond Apollo by Barry Malzberg
data.meta_description: I've started Beyond Apollo, and I have to say - this book is very disturbing, in a very good way. At times *spoiler spoiler spoiler* his madness is...
data.text: I've started Beyond Apollo, and I have to say - this book is very disturbing, in a very good way. At times *spoiler spoiler spoiler* his madness is contagious and bizarre. Highly recommended, but be sure not to smoke anything before you start - it's hard to put the book down, and it sucks you into a whirlwind of pain, agony and just... just plain craziness.
